ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Young hunter
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] as a child, {PAWN_gender ? he : she} was fond of archery, practicing hunting.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Young archer
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had a chance to take part in the defense of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} settlement from the terrible iron monsters. {PAWN_gender ? He : She} hid in towers and behind buildings, firing back from a long bow.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Shaman apprentice
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sent to training by a tribal religious leader who taught {PAWN_gender ? him : her} the art of spear fighting.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Cheif apprentice
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been studying for a long time in the family of the chief, who tells {PAWN_gender ? him : her} the intricacies of handling heavy weapons.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Losted child
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been alone for a long time in {PAWN_gender ? his : her} young life. {PAWN_gender ? He : She} was forgotten during the stay of the tribal caravan. Realizing {PAWN_gender ? his : her} position, [PAWN_nameDef] learns the art of hunting and stealth to find food.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Brave
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: During another raid on {PAWN_gender ? his : her} native village, the attackers surrounded the leader's house and set it on fire. [PAWN_nameDef] rushed to the rescue, calmly neutralizing several people. The leader identified {PAWN_gender ? him : her} as personal bodyguard, expressing {PAWN_gender ? his : her} gratitude.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Wanderer
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] got lost in the forest and was unable to return to {PAWN_gender ? his : her} native tribe. Several years of wandering had hardened {PAWN_gender ? him : her} physically and taught {PAWN_gender ? him : her} to stand up for {PAWN_gender ? himself : herself}.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Warrior child
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: Father [PAWN_nameDef] was a stern but fair warrior. He taught [PAWN_nameDef] the martial arts as well as showing mercy to the enemy.
